I have opened the Samurai Archives Japanese history bookstore for
business:=


http://astore.amazon.com/samurai-20

The store is organized by historical=
 period.  I'm still in the process
of adding books, however most of the pop=
ular and best books are
already there. I'll be adding a fiction and DVD sec=
tion later on. 
Every sale goes towards the cost of the domain name and ser=
ver for
Samurai-archives.com so your patronage is appreciated!

Thanks.
